Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor





Nasco Middle East

T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1668

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor





Nasco Middle East

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

GIG is pleased to confirm cover from 12/04/2025 for a period of 12 months.

 

Please provide the following to book the policy:

 

*	KYC in GIG Format as attached (Fully signed & stamped by the Client/Insured) – All fields must be filled including reason why they cannot be able to provide certain documents as per our Compliance mandatory requirement.

*	Passport copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners

*	Memorandum & Articles of Association
*	Final list  

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor





Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

GIG is pleased to confirm cover from 12/04/2025 for a period of 12 months.

 

Please provide the following to book the policy:

 

*	KYC in GIG Format as attached (Fully signed & stamped by the Client/Insured) – All fields must be filled including reason why they cannot be able to provide certain documents as per our Compliance mandatory requirement.

*	Valid Trade License (Complete pages of document)
*	TRN/VAT Certificate 
*	Emirates ID copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Passport copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Invoice From authorized dealer signed and stamped. 
	
*	Memorandum & Articles of Association
*	Final list  

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD)

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

GIG is pleased to confirm cover from 12/04/2025 for a period of 12 months.

 

Please provide the following to book the policy:

 

*	KYC in GIG Format as attached (Fully signed & stamped by the Client/Insured) – All fields must be filled including reason why they cannot be able to provide certain documents as per our Compliance mandatory requirement.
*	If any of the above shareholders is a corporate entity, please provide the details of shareholders who directly or indirectly own or control more than 20% of the share capital. Please mention the percentage of shareholding against their name. Ultimate Beneficiary Owners are required.
*	Valid Trade License (Complete pages of document)
*	TRN/VAT Certificate 
*	Emirates ID copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Passport copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Invoice From authorized dealer signed and stamped. 
	
*	Memorandum & Articles of Association
*	Final list  

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor





Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1668

Subject: RE: REAL EMIRATES LLC - 13/VF/911007126/0/0 & 13/VX/911001269/0/0 - Renewal Terms - Expiring on 11/04/2025 - 55311

 

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

GIG is pleased to confirm cover from 12/04/2025 for a period of 12 months.

 

Please provide the following to book the policy:

 

*	KYC in GIG Format as attached (Fully signed & stamped by the Client/Insured) – All fields must be filled including reason why they cannot be able to provide certain documents as per our Compliance mandatory requirement.
*	If any of the above shareholders is a corporate entity, please provide the details of shareholders who directly or indirectly own or control more than 20% of the share capital. Please mention the percentage of shareholding against their name. Ultimate Beneficiary Owners are required.
*	Valid Trade License (Complete pages of document)
*	TRN/VAT Certificate 
*	Emirates ID copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Passport copy of authorized signatory/ Shareholders/Directors/Partners/Ultimate Beneficiary Owners
*	Invoice From authorized dealer signed and stamped. 
	
*	Memorandum & Articles of Association
*	Final list  

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor

Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Good Morning

 

The above motor fleet policies are due for renewal, please find the attached renewal terms from GIG.

 

Kindly note due to adverse loss ratio the rates have been revised this year.

 

1.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 2.82% for Private vehicles
2.	Expiring Rate 2.35%. Revised Renewal rate 3.00% for Commercial vehicles 

 

Third Party renewal terms released as per expiring.

 

Terms are approved subject to no further deterioration of claims, vehicle list and no known or reported losses until renewal of the policy. 

 

Additions are subject to performance, UW approval and/or Rate change, should the performance deteriorate.

 

Please note motors terms are subject to all LOB placed with GIG.

 

“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

chunks.text:
“It is necessary for the insured to disclose any information related to material facts or any change in the information previously provided that would influence the Company's decision regarding the continuation to accept the risk cover, conditions or prices previously determined, whether such change has occurred after the Policy commencement date or after the last renewal thereof; whichever occurs later.”

 

On confirmation kindly provide the following:

 

*	Fully Completed KYC Form.  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	VAT certificate
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid D Copies of Authorized Signatories. 
*	Audit Financials Report

 

Note:  If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

            

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor





Nasco Middle East
